body.p: Your custom document templates can be shared with the other members of your team by integrating them in a framework (document type) configuration.

section.title: How to Integrate Custom Document Templates in a Framework
section.p:
To integrate a custom document template in a framework, follow these steps:
In that new folder structure, create another folder that will contain all of your custom Schematron files (for example, custom_frameworks/dita-extension/templates).
Save your custom document templates in the folder you created in step 2.
Make whatever changes you desire to the extension, then go to the Templates tab, remove all previous entries from it and add a new entry pointing to your custom templates folder: ${frameworkDir}/templates.

section.title: Sharing Custom Document Templates
section.p: To share custom document templates with other members of your team, you simply need to share the framework where you integrated the Schematron rules. There are several methods for sharing frameworks and you can find details here: .
